headline.main: TURKS SAID TO LEAN TO UNITED NATIONS; But They Will Defend Country Against 'Any Aggressor,' Visitors Here Assert

lead_paragraph: The Turkish people favor the cause of the United Nations but will defend their liberty against "any aggression," the spokesman for a visiting group of five Turkish journalists said yesterday on their arrival aboard a Pan American Airways Clipper at La Guardia Field.
abstract: C Yalcin, Istanbul Yeni Sabah ed, and other Turkish eds, arrive, NYC, on US tour; Yalcin comments on Turkish neutrality

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
